text: Jit Singh (born 13 January 1937) is an Indian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle middleweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of India Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1970 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 1970 Asian Games
title: Jit Singh
